attributes.action: Retain Local Public Services in Surrey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the recomendations of the Lyons report 20000 public service jobs are to removed from London & the South East by 2010. 
This move will be detrimental to both hard working public servants and members of the public in Surrey. 
An enfeebled public service in Surrey will mean 
•	The reduction in the services to the public.
•	The loss of experienced and skilled staff.  
•	The reduction in flexible part time employment opportunities for those with school age children and/or other responsibility of care.
•	The reduction in work experience opportunities for local school students.
We therefore ask the Prime Minister to reconsider the relocation of public service jobs in Surrey.
